mapper.select: SELECT a.userNum, b.orderUserNum, (b.orderUserNum/ a.userNum) AS buyRate, r.amount, r.ordernum/u.userNum AS orderNum, r.amount/u.userNum AS userBuyRate FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS userNum FROM mtmydb.`mtmy_users`) a, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(user_id)) AS orderUserNum FROM mtmydb.`mtmy_orders` WHERE parent_id=0 AND order_status>0 )b, (SELECT SUM(amount) AS amount,SUM(ordernum) AS orderNum FROM mtmydb.`order_report` )AS r, (SELECT SUM(usernum) AS userNum FROM mtmydb.`user_report`) AS u

SELECT userNum, (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = province ) AS province, (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = city ) AS city, (SELECT a.name FROM trains.sys_area AS a where a.id = district ) AS district, (SELECT a.code FROM trains.sys_area AS a WHERE a.id = district ) AS CODE, orderNum, amount FROM mtmydb.area_user_report ORDER BY CODE ASC
